thread.title: MICHELLE STACK

author: MICHELLE STACK
title: MICHELLE STACK
text:
Assistant could have been friendlier, left over â‚¬500 in shop on a Dyson vacuum cleaner ., it would have been nice if assistant offered to bring it out to the car which was literally outside the door ,for me especially as it was such a quiet day ...
He was professional and explained all I needed to know bout the vacuum cleaner ... just didn't get the nice friendly vibe ..
